attributes.action: make people under the influence of alcohol pay for their treatment in A&E
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im sick of watching tv programmes where drunken louts waste valuable NHS time and money through drunken injuries and despicable behaviour. By introducing a standard £100 (example) fee for treatment received whilst over the limit the NHS would make some money towards the treatment and maybe people would think about what they are doing before wasting NHS time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
